A set of interrelated perl modules, offering an open interface to ClearCase

= Introduction =

Collaborating is hard.
Even on tools such as ClearCase, which are collaboration tools.
There is a large dispersion of forums, lists, sites.
So here is one more, sadly enough.
Focused on developing a set of packages, around ideas created by David Boyce.

= Details =

  * Argv
  * !ClearCase::Argv
  * !ClearCase::!SyncTree
  * !ClearCase::Wrapper
  * !ClearCase::Wrapper::DSB
